thread.section_title: Road Runner Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Road Runner Sports | www.roadrunnersports.com
thread.title: Jiim
thread.title_full: Road Runner Sports reviewed by Jiim

author: Jiim
title: Jiim
text: Called two times over three days and talked with two different reps inquiring about shoes, both times I felt like they just wanted to get off the phone, I did not buy shoes due too felling as though they either they did not have the knowledge or just not interested in helping me. Very poor service.
